sentence.Network_en: Clinical symptoms found in young pigs suffering from choline deficiency are unthriftiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 已发现的缺乏胆碱的幼猪的临床症状是身体憔悴.

sentence.Network_en: Gastrointestinal parasitism is characterized gastroenteritis, unthriftiness and anemia.
sentence.Network_cn: 胃肠道寄生虫病的特征是:胃肠炎, 瘦弱和贫血.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...d weakness), 搐搦(tetany), 身体憔悴(unthriftiness),以及卡蛋(egg-binding)。
